english.segment1: There is no lovelier sound. To be lost then to be found. Even more than we do now, we will rejoice. (repeat)
english.segment2: (Chorus:). Jesus, hurry come back for us we cannot wait. Jesus, hurry come back, we cannot wait, we cannot wait. (repeat)
english.segment3: We will sing, we will dance to songs about all that You do. Evermore to be with You is all we want. (repeat)
english.segment5: Until at last, we see Your face and behold Your glory. Until at last, we see Your face. We want to see all Your glory, all Your glory
english.segment6: Jesus, hurry come back, hurry come back Lord.. I can't wait till You come back for me..
